component.name: Subtitld
component.summary: Subtitld is a software to create and edit subtitles

description.p: Subtitld is an open source software to edit, transcribe and create subtitles. It is able to read and write various formats like SRT, SSA, TTML, SBV, DFXP, VTT, XML, SCC and SAMI.
Icons (SVG) are now stored on a qrc file (0b46f4e7)
Use of PNG files in Windows version due to a bug with MSIX packaging
Fixes an issue updating the list of subtitles when there is no subtitles
Fixes on saving in default format
